description:
The group learns about Ryugu Palace`s hidden past and Otohime`s terrifying plan. And they are the only ones who can stop her. Kamenashi suggests they split up into teams and head to Otohime. While breaking up into teams, they are spotted by lookouts and they are thrust in a desperate situation. Meanwhile, Otae, who has been captured by Otohime, is in danger!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beauty Is Like a Summer Fruit
Bi wa Natsu no Kajitsu no Gotoki Mono
美は夏の果実の如き物
